description: This Dashboard provides a general overview of a RaspiBolt system, with templating to host and Interval

targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") - mean("free") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT 8 * derivative(mean("bytes_recv"),1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" = 'JumpHost' AND "interface" = 'eth0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 8 * derivative(mean("bytes_sent"),1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" = 'JumpHost' AND "interface" = 'eth0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

title: RaspiBolt System Overview
